creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: seated portrait of green-eyed, bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; watch chain attached to vest; four pins on PL lapel; blurry trees in distance with darkening blue sky; mounted behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
title: Nineteen Lincolns
